mapper.insert: insert into data_management_info (order_id, contract_hand_date, mortgage_hand_date, mortgage_send_date) values (#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{contractHandDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mortgageHandDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mortgageSendDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into data_management_info
order_id,
contract_hand_date,
mortgage_hand_date,
mortgage_send_date,
#{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{contractHandDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mortgageHandDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{mortgageSendDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update data_management_info
contract_hand_date = #{contractHandDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mortgage_hand_date = #{mortgageHandDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mortgage_send_date = #{mortgageSendDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select loan.id from loan_order loan left join loan_customer cus on cus.id = loan.loan_customer_id left join loan_process process on process.order_id = loan.id where process.order_status =1 and process.material_print_review =1 and cus.id_card = #{idCard}
